Posts.Content: Hi Busymom, I had my 1st FEC 10 days ago (3xFEC & 3xT). 1 down & 5 to go. I took all the medication as instructed and side effects is minimal. Hope all of us will sail through this with minimal side effects!!! Kim x
Posts.Title: 2 days into chemo.........

Posts.Content: Hi M65, I have the same symptoms few days after each FEC treatment. My GP said I have mild constipation even I did go to toilet. I was prescribed Macrogol drink to take which soften the stool and suppositories to reduce the piles. After a few days, the symptoms settled but have to continue with the Macrogol drink until I finish my last chemo treatment (GP & Oncologist adv). Hope this help but still get your GP check it up. Hope everything settle soon!!! Kim x
Posts.Title: FEC - sorry...question about piles and black stools!!
